Achievements.Name: Rough Awakening
Achievements.Description: Wake up from a terrible nightmare in Chapter 1: Fears Half Forgotten.

Achievements.Name: Contained!
Achievements.Description: Close all cargo containers in Chapter 2: Trouble at the Docks.

Achievements.Name: Workplace Safety
Achievements.Description: Defeat the threat against the comic book store in Chapter 3: Heck Breaks Loose.

Achievements.Name: Metalhead
Achievements.Description: Prevent a mystic artifact from being stolen in Chapter 4: Helmet Blunder.

Achievements.Name: Tourist
Achievements.Description: Visit a picturesque temple and live to tell the tale in Chapter 5: Eye of the Dragon.

Achievements.Name: Woodsman
Achievements.Description: Survive the hostile fauna in Chapter 6: Crossroads.

Achievements.Name: A Million Volts
Achievements.Description: Cause enough havoc to escape danger in Chapter 7: Jungle Boogie.

Achievements.Name: Swamp Thing
Achievements.Description: Survive the swamp horrors in Chapter 8: A Helping Wing.

Achievements.Name: Nothing To See Here
Achievements.Description: Clear monstrous squatters from the ruins in Chapter 9: Big, Bad and Ugly.

Achievements.Name: Next!
Achievements.Description: Defeat a horde of minions in Chapter 10: The New Boss in Town.

Achievements.Name: Live to Fight Another Day
Achievements.Description: Survive your first encounter with a dangerous foe in Chapter 11: Blazing Guns.

Achievements.Name: Overshadowed
Achievements.Description: Return a forgotten memory to its sleeping place in Chapter 12: A Shadow from the Past.

Achievements.Name: Janitor
Achievements.Description: Clean up a horde of monsters in Chapter 13: The Great Escape.

Achievements.Name: All in a Day's Work
Achievements.Description: Save the world in Chapter 14: The Hordes of Doom.

Achievements.Name: Zookeeper
Achievements.Description: Reach round 7 in Survival: Horde.

Achievements.Name: Lightbringer
Achievements.Description: Reach round 7 in Survival: Darkness.

Achievements.Name: Shadowboxer
Achievements.Description: Reach round 7 in Survival: Shadow Warriors.

Achievements.Name: Unmasker
Achievements.Description: Reach round 7 in Survival: Masked Warriors.

Achievements.Name: Extreme Survivalist
Achievements.Description: Reach round 21 in Survival: Horde.

Achievements.Name: Blue Belt
Achievements.Description: Defeat 100 enemies.

Achievements.Name: Red Belt
Achievements.Description: Defeat 200 enemies.

Achievements.Name: Black Belt
Achievements.Description: Defeat 400 enemies.

Achievements.Name: Rumbler
Achievements.Description: Damage four or more enemies with a single Ground Shaker.

Achievements.Name: Zapper
Achievements.Description: Finish off three or more enemies using Lightning in one fight.

Achievements.Name: Power Punisher
Achievements.Description: Hit an enemy from behind with Power Punch.

Achievements.Name: Air Superiority
Achievements.Description: Hit a flying enemy with Power Punch.

Achievements.Name: Slo-Mo Master
Achievements.Description: Deal damage six times during a single Time Stop.

Achievements.Name: Nick of Time
Achievements.Description: Block an attack when you have less than 10% health remaining.

Achievements.Name: Perfect Style
Achievements.Description: Reach 100% style in a single fight by using a varied combination of attacks.

Achievements.Name: Fight Marathon
Achievements.Description: Defeat 100 or more enemies during a single fight.

Achievements.Name: Headshot!
Achievements.Description: Shoot a Giant in the head with the Magic Bow.

Achievements.Name: Kung-Fu Party!
Achievements.Description: Complete a multiplayer fight against 3 or more players controlling enemies.

Achievements.Name: Artful Dodger
Achievements.Description: In a single fight, perform a dodge, duck, flip dodge, backflip dodge and jump dodge.

Achievements.Name: William Tell
Achievements.Description: Score five consecutive hits using the Magic Bow.

Achievements.Name: Tenacious
Achievements.Description: In Chapter 4: Helmet Blunder, defeat the Shadow Guard without using Ground Shaker.

Achievements.Name: Pick on Someone Your Own Size
Achievements.Description: Finish off a Giant while giant-sized yourself.

Achievements.Name: Tactician
Achievements.Description: Win a single fight without physically touching any enemies yourself.

Achievements.Name: Wham!
Achievements.Description: Hit an Armored Inkling while Mega Damage is active.

Achievements.Name: Multitasker
Achievements.Description: Hit an enemy while zapping a different enemy with Lightning.

Achievements.Name: Fast as Lightning
Achievements.Description: Complete a Mayhem Designer fight against a total of 6 or more enemies with a time scale of 150%.

Achievements.Name: And Stay Down!
Achievements.Description: Finish off a Giant by bringing one down to its knees, then using Ground Shaker on its back.

Achievements.Name: Volley!
Achievements.Description: Shoot 100 or more arrows with the Magic Bow during one fight.

Achievements.Name: Bullseye!
Achievements.Description: Use the Magic Bow to hit an enemy that is over 30 meters away.

Achievements.Name: Double Black Belt of Awesomeness
Achievements.Description: Acquire all other achievements.

Achievements.Name: Untouchable
Achievements.Description: For 3 minutes, avoid hitting and getting hit by enemies in Chapter 2: Trouble at the Docks.
